question1.question: Individual wedding planning
question1.answer: Organizing a wedding, especially abroad, is a complex and time-consuming process. For your wedding to go the way you want it to, you need a specialist‚Äôs help. MarriageGuide Agency is engaged in individual wedding planning for foreign couples in Georgia. This includes:
question1.first: - Developing the concept of a wedding.
question1.third: - Reserving the restaurant, hotel, car, etc.
question1.fourth: - Selecting a photographer, decorator, make-up artist, etc.
question1.fifth: - Control of all stages of the wedding, from applying for marriage registration to sending you the finished wedding photos.
question1.answer2: Every wedding is like a personal celebration for us. We will do everything we can to make sure your wedding in Georgia is perfect.

question2.question: What documents do I need to get married in Georgia?
question2.answer: To register a marriage in Georgia foreign citizens need:
question2.first: - Passport (with a translation into Georgian, certified by a notary).
question2.second: - An approved application for marriage registration. To be submitted at the House of Justice in advance.
question2.third: - Certified certificate of divorce, if one or both partners were previously married.
question2.answer2: If you want to get married in Georgia, you may need: birth and baptismal certificates, permission from your priest, and a document confirming that you have been taught by your church about the importance of marriage and the inviolability of its vows.

question3.question: Why get legally married in Georgia?
question3.answer: 10 reasons why it is worth concluding in Georgia:
question3.second: - Opportunity to get married in 24 hours.
question3.third: - Minimal paperwork ‚Äì only a passport and a Georgian translation are needed.
question3.fourth: - You only need two witnesses to get married.
question3.fifth: - Citizens of 94 countries don‚Äôt need a visa to visit Georgia.
question3.sixth: - You do not need to be a Georgian citizen or have a residence permit to get married.
question3.seventh: - Very low prices for organizing a wedding.
question3.eighth: - Marriage performed in Georgia is recognized as legal all over the world.
question3.ninth: - Beautiful views and a large selection of stunning locations.
question3.tenth: - Full wedding service from MarriageGuide Agency.

question4.question: Can foreigners get married in Georgia?
question4.answer: Foreign citizens, even those without residence permits, can get married in Georgia. In recent years Georgia has become one of the centers of wedding tourism in the world. This is due to the very loyal legislation of Georgia in matters of marriage. For example:
question4.first: - To get married in Georgia you need only a passport and two witnesses.
question4.second: - Foreigners can get married within 24 hours.
question4.third: - Citizens of 94 countries do not need a visa to visit Georgia.
question4.fourth: - People of any religion can get married in Georgia.
question4.fifth: - Weddings in Georgia are much cheaper than in most countries.
question4.sixth: - All worries about the organization of the wedding can take care of by the wedding agency ('MarriageGuide')
